main event: A civilian reported seeing a bright object in the night sky from Kansas City, Missouri in February 1967.
interesting points: The observation lasted 3-4 minutes,The object was described as brighter than usual before fading away,The witness thought the object resembled the size of the head of a dime,The object was seen at a 45-degree angle and appeared stationary before disappearing,The report suggests that this may have been mistaken for a normal phenomenon under unusual conditions.
sighted object: a bright object in the sky
